quote: One small positive thought can change your whole day.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: The more one judges, the less one loves.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: If I can stop one heart from breaking, I shall not live in vain.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: When you reach the top of the mountain, keep climbing.
author: Zen Proverb

quote: Yesterday is gone. Tomorrow has not yet come. We have only today.
author: Mother Teresa
